name: Azure Recording Download Sample
description: A sample code that includes frontend and backend to download Opentok recording from Azure

OT_API_KEY.description: Vonage Video API API Key. Get it from Video API Dashboard

OT_API_SECRET.description: Vonage Video API API Secret. Get it from Video API Dashboard

AZ_ACCOUNT_NAME.description: Your Azure Storage account name. View it in Access Key section.

AZ_ACCOUNT_KEY.description: Your Azure Storage account key. View it in Access Key section.
